short_summary: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME
description: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME:Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. You must submit your statement of capability by14:00 EDT on October 17 2023. Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s (AAFC) Swift Current Research and Development Centre (SCRDC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one (1) new Amphasys Flow Cytometry Ampha Z40. A complete list of the mandatory specifications are detailed in the Annex – Statement of Requirement. The requirement is subject to the provisions of: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
full_summary:
